House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04309
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING POLICIES TO MITIGATE THE TRAFFIC CRISIS IN THE COUNTRY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Traffic Mitigating Act
ABSTRACT : Grants emergency powers to the President in order to bring forth solutions, either short or long term to the perennial problem of traffic congestion, not just in Metro Manila but also of the whole country which drains time and resources of the nation.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROBES, FLORIDA "RIDA" P.
DATE FILED : 2016-11-08
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
